transcript:
Customer: Ja vyaktis aapan call kelela aahe, teesat
Aapan ja vyakti
Hello
Executive: Hello sir good morning.
Customer: Good morning sir boliye na.
Executive: Ha sir mam ka actually abhi call aaya tha to mam bata rahi thi ki matlab
Ye matlab maine aapko jo bataya tha ki call pe lead consume karai ya fir lead manager pe reply karaya hai na ya jo maine meeting kari to kya wo sir wo meeting nahi karni chahiye thi kya mujhe main aapse puchna chah raha hu.
Customer: Karna chahiye tha.
Executive: To bas mam ko shayad wo cheez matlab maine aapko ye cheez batai to shayad mam ko ye cheez pasand nahi aayi to mam ne bola ki matlab aapko sir ko nahi batana chahiye tha ye cheez.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To baki dekho sir aap owner ho company ke aap agar man lijiye report card mangenge ya performance report ki kya employee kitna man lijiye lead consume kar rahe hain ya nahi kar rahe hain aapne khud bhi mujhse samne se ye cheez bola ki sir har cheez ke liye matlab main aapko thodi na call karta rahunga aapne employee
Customer: Nahi nahi main madam ko call kar
Executive: Samjhata madam ko wo aapko response dengi wo bilkul dena hi padega unko.
Customer: Main aapko unko batana hu main aapko.
Executive: Nahi nahi mam ko sir mam ko matlab kuch datiyega mat is cheez ke liye kyuki mam thoda sa shayad ho sakta hai ki mam bura man gaye ho lekin ye hai na sir ki jaise regularly agar lead consume karenge to usse sir benefit dekhiye company ka hi rahega aapka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hai na kyuki sir dekhiye bina lead consume kiye to profile niche down hoti chali jayegi aur order vagaira bhi utne hum log nahi nikal payenge.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na baat baki sir maine isiliye bola ki jaise aapko kitne bhi bar help ki zarurat pade mahine mein aap mujhe kitne bhi bar aap call kar sakte ho mam se bhi maine ye cheez bola ki aap kitne bhi bar mujhse connect kar sakte hain mahine mein ek se do bar main connect karunga feedback ke liye agar aap busy honge to aap mujhe bata dijiyega ki nahi sir abhi main busy hu is time pe connect kar lijiye aap ya agle din kar lijiye ya monday ko kar lijiye to usi ke according
Customer: Sir aap monday teen mahine madam aap ek milke group aap meeting kar lete.
Executive: Hmm.
Kal aapne actually sir matlab jo dissatisfied mark kar diya meeting ka to wahi maine socha ki matlab kya meeting fruitful nahi thi us meeting ka koi result nahi tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kyuki usse usse kya hua sir employee yani hamari performance pe fark pad gaya.
Hamko kyuki dekhiye kabhi positive feedback to man lijiye jaldi nahi milta hai lekin ha negative feedback dalne se kya rehta hai ki yani ki hum humne jo meeting kari humne us us meeting mein koi result nahi nikla wo meeting matlab client ke kaam aapki services focus ho gayi hai kya bolta kaisa hai.
Aapse zyada achche achche kaam kar rahe jo dusre chhote chhote hai na unme investment karke wo achcha response bhi de rahe hain aur abhi humne just dial aapse bahut peeche magar just dial achcha de raha hai wo result.
Executive: Achcha sir ji mujhe please ye bataiyega jaise agar man lijiye agar hum log teen mahine se agar man lijiye hum log lead na ke barabar ek do lead agar consume karenge to
Inquiry se to sir man lijiye limited customer hi aa rahe hain call se hai na bahut sare customers jo lead post kar rahe hain ab agar hum log lead nahi consume karenge to fir unse baat chit nahi ho payegi.
Customer: Sir ye topic ek ek bar ek topic pe baat kijiye sir main kaisa hai mere ko din bhar baat karna padta aap kya karte malum hai ghuma ghuma ke ghuma ghuma ke ek hi baat ko 50 nahi 500 bar wahi baat karte aap.
Apne ko apne ko aapka bolne ka matlab hai lead aap purchase nahi kar rahe hum lead purchase karenge aur achcha achcha response milega humko bhi aur aapko bhi theek hai karte hain hum wo aur aur dusri baat kya ki aap madam ko phone karte raho aap wo agar wo bolte ki main kaam nahi karungi ya sir ko bolne ka maine unki recording karke rakha hua aapse jo bhi baat kiya tha main record kiya maine aur wo madam ke jo husband hai unko bataya maine.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Kya ye madam ka response achcha nahi hai aur aisa raha to main unko job se nahi nahi sir job vagaira dekhiye job vagaira se mat nikaliyega kisi ko bhi ye hai ki dekhiye thoda sa jaise ek bar
Executive: Nahi nahi sir
Customer: Main sir main jab tak kya hua to jab tak to main karunga magar mere ko response nahi milega mere ko mere ko achcha feedback nahi milega to main kyu rakhunga.
Executive: Ha wahi dekhiye investment sir aapne kiya hua hai to zahir si baat hai aapko result chahiye hoga.
Customer: Sir bahut paise dala hai aapke isme magar kuch bhi result nahi mil rahe kya bolna aapko kuch bhi nahi.
Executive: Main sir isiliye to dekhiye mera main objective to sir yahi hai na ki aapko achchi service provide karna aapka experience achcha karna.
Customer: Nahi mil raha na sir service nahi mil rahi na service nahi mil rahi na bas baat hi chal rahi hai na apni service achchi milna chahiye aapko sir main wahi kaam kar raha hu main service par focus kar raha hu main lead par focus kar raha hu.
Customer vagaira aisa hamara interest kab badhta customer ne local ki lead mili humko agar to usme hamara bahut interest badhta akola district ke andar kam se kam jitni bhi samjho district tahsil level ke tahsil hai sir panch panch che tahsil hai tahsil ke baad mein jo gaav hai gaav mein ki jo gaav ke hai log unhone humko purchase karna chahiye hamari MD block ki site pe ja ke to humko usme interest aayega ab hamara nagpur mein hamara koi lena dena nahi hai hamara aurangabad mein koi lena dena waha ke liye purchase karke kya karegi.
Executive: Nahi nahi waha ki karna hi nahi mam ne jaise mam se saat aath shahro cities ki jaise baat hui hingoli hai saat aath ko main bata aapko likha leta ek pehle akola district hai apna amravati district hai buldhana district hai aur buldhana hai parwani hai sir ye sare parwani nahi hai parwani bhi nahi hai hingoli hai washim bahut ho gaya apna.
Customer: Achcha to ye hai sir ki jaise humko keval in cities pe focus karna hai to in city ki jaise man lijiye koi lead post hua hai to hum log usko consume kar lenge bhale agar hum log busy hain to hum log sham ko call kar lenge usko.
Executive: Chalega na chalega na aap focus karo pehle aap.
Executive: Theek hai bas ye hai sir daily jaise hum log do teen lead consume kar lenge sir to mahine mein 60 70 customer lead se nikalenge aur kuch customer ke direct inquiry aayenge kuch call aayenge itne se sir hamara kaam sahi chalega.
Customer: Chalega na theek hai na.
Executive: Hai na.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai baki ye hai ki sir matlab mam ko aap mat kuch kahiyega thoda sa ye hai ki jaise ek bar
Customer: Ek bar maine baatein suna hai jab karke aapko unhone aisa bola ki sir ko kaiko bola karke aapne.
Executive: Nahi abhi mam actually mam thoda sa gussa the mujhse to mujhe laga shayad mujhe nahi batana chahiye tha to maine kaha ek bar aapko bola unko main job kar rahe wo unko payment shuru hai na unko sir main kaisa payment shuru hai unko to unko kaam to karna padega na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ye cheeze hai sir thoda sa aur baki koi dikkat nahi hai sir matlab meri help ki kitni bhi bar zarurat padegi aap mahine mein kitne bhi bar aap mujhse connect kijiyega jab aap
Customer: Are main kya help karu meri help se koi karna hai yaar main pareshan hu main kya bolu mera sir main karunga aap karte karte sir main karunga aap nishchint rahega meri taraf se theek hai na theek hai na chalo aap main mam ko samjhate raho pyar se matlab apun job kar rahe hain unko bolna madam madam ko samjha ke bolo aapke job kar rahe hain aap lead purchase karo aapko ghar ke ghar ke kaam hai unko office pe nahi aana hai na koi baithna nahi hai.
Executive: Ji maine samjhaya maine samjhaya wo jo work hai na wo unka homework hai home se yani ghar se unko working karna hai.
Executive: Ha wahi maine bola ki sir ne to matlab aapka problem vagaira samjha aur delivery vagaira bhi tha us time pe to sir ne aapko work from home diya tha ab sir to dono jagah invest kar rahe hain to unko to result chahiye hoga overall to mam ne bhi bola ki ab karenge matlab regular hum log karenge regular karne laga unko ek minute ruk jao line par raho.
Executive: Ji ye unke husband ko samjha raha tha thoda sa bolna mat ki aap unko bolna mat bahut ek minute ruko.
Customer: Ha Deepak tu ka niche hai na nahi main upar hu are baap re fir thun thun thun thun pani laga ke kuch bolo mat ha boliye sir.
Hello
Executive: Hello ha sunil sir boliye na.
Customer: Ha sir to sir koi dikkat nahi hai matlab ye hai ki mam abhi matlab gradually jo hai unke unke husband hai wo mat sir aap point to point baat kijiye aap dekhiye aap maskat lagaiye unko please ha seedhi seedhi kya problem ho bataiye wo mat bataiye aap delivery ka iska uska wo wo unko jo lage to wo lagega ki maine jaan bujh ke fir aapko call pe unko aisa lagega.
Executive: Ha ha nahi koi dikkat nahi hai seedhi seedhi boliye bas ha isme dekhiye ye hai sir ki jaise last three months se leads vagaira jo hai wo consume nahi ho rahe the to is vajah se inquiry vagaira nahi aa rahe the aur sir ka investment vagaira bhi dono jagah ka hai sir to to jaise india mart pe bhi inhone investment kiya hai aur employee ko bhi salary dena hota hai to agar orders nahi aayenge sir to definitely sir wo matlab unka naraz hona bhi genuine hai aur mam ko humne isiliye bola tha ki regular basis pe kya hai ki keval lead consume kar lena hai jo bhi apne local area ki aati hai local area ki leads consume karenge to ye rahega ki kuch orders nikalenge kuch order nikalenge to business generation generate hoga thoda to bas itni si baat hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ha bas itni si baat hai sir aur koi baat nahi hai aur baki mam ko matlab cheeze matlab clear bhi ho gayi hai kal meeting vagaira humne kiya abhi tha to usme hum logo ne kuch points bhi discuss kiye the to leads inquiry call aur call pe mam ka achcha response tha maine sir ko bhi bataya tha 85% call jo hai wo answer hoti hai lekin lekin isme ye hai ki jaise leads vagaira jo hai na wo waste ho ja rahi hai jaise three months se pura lead waste ho ja raha tha ha wo rest par the three maine bola na aapko rest par the unka teen mahine ka hai na to teen mahine to lead jaise hum log bilkul nahi consume karenge to ginti ke che saat call aayenge agar man lijiye pure mahine mein aur che saat call mein aap bhi jante ho sir ki customer daam puch ke ho sakta hai ki deal kare ya na bhi kare hai na to agar man lijiye hum log che saat call pick karke 85% response bana bhi le agar call ka to usme bahut zyada result nahi dekhne ko milega result kahan pe milega jo daily lead post ho rahi hai.
Customer: Sir abhi call aapne mere ko kiya ki maine kiya tha aapko.
Executive: Nahi nahi abhi matlab call jo hai wo maine kiya tha aapko aur isme koi matlab wo nahi hai mam se meri baat hui thi thodi der pehle mam ka mere pass call aaya tha to mam ne ye bhi bola hai ki abhi se hum log matlab aisa koi mauka nahi denge aur properly kaam karenge hum log thoda sa thoda sa network ka issue aa raha tha mam ke sath mein to us time pe ye tha aur mam ne bataya bhi tha us time pe mujhe bhi bataya tha aur aapne bhi mujhe inform kiya tha to isiliye maine bahut zyada matlab force bhi nahi kiya ki mam aap time dijiye.
Customer: Theek hai na madam ko call karte rehna ki aap sir do teen week mein weekly samjhate rahiye kaisa kya purchase karna hai madam karte kam koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Ha bas ye hai na sir jaise agar daily basis pe aadha ghanta bhi mam de denge na to utna bhi sufficient rahega.
Customer: Ha nahi nahi karte karte kaam karte theek hai chalega sir koi dikkat nahi deepak samajh mein aa gaya na ha theek hai ek minute ha theek hai sir rakhu kya fir main ha sir abhi rakh sakte hain abhi main sir ticket jo hai wo jo open hua hai aapne not satisfied mark kiya tha na to usko main filhal close kar raha hu karta hu karta hu sir karta hu
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with the meeting outcome.

- Leads not being consumed regularly.

- Wants local leads for better customer interest.

- Wants executive to keep explaining to madam.



Resolution:

- Executive assured regular lead consumption.

- Executive will explain madam about lead purchase.

- Executive will close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, subscription, meeting, performance, local leads, investment
